page_content:
ENGAGEMENT WITH CUSTOMERS, INCLUDING CONSUMERS, PATIENTS, PHARMACISTS AND PHARMACY BENEFIT 
MANAGERS (PBMS)
Mechanism For 
EngagementExpectations/Issues That  
Arose Through Engagement Actions Taken
–  Always-on Walgreens and 
Boots UK customer satisfaction 
surveys
–  Most weekdays, through 
our corporate website and 
business websites
–  Daily, through social media
–  Daily, through our retail 
pharmacies and CSR initiatives–  COVID-19 response, especially 
around safety in stores and 
availability of essential items
–  Diversity and inclusion
–  Access to affordable and quality 
healthcare
–  Product labeling  
and transparency
–  Data privacy and security
–  Packaging
–  Plastics
–  Energy use and climate impacts
–  Sustainable products–  COVID-19 response including customer safety 
measures, ensuring supplies of essential items, 
testing sites, and information campaigns
–  Responses to racial equity movement including 
listening sessions, executive commitment 
to improved DEI performance, work with 
communities on health disparities
–  Continued and expanded unconscious  
bias training
–  Joined U.S. Beyond the Bag initiative
–  Continued copay support for patients
–  Ongoing community health events  
and flu shot vouchers
–  Continuation of HIV testing collaboration
–  Continued implementation of package label 
enhancements on owned brand products
–  Continued information security efforts  
including training
–  Launched and expanded sustainable  
product lines
34 | Walgreens Boots Alliance  | Corporate Social Responsibility Report 2020
OVERVIEW
